title: Next Permutation
statement: Given an array of N integers representing a permutation of numbers, rearrange the array to form the next lexicographically greater permutation. If no such permutation exists (array is in descending order), rearrange to the smallest permutation (ascending order).
input_format:
First line contains N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.
output_format: Print N space-separated integers representing the next permutation.
